title: Locked in Love
description: Here comes the bride…Nick and Holly are in the mountains once again to celebrate with the people closest to them as they become one.The cabin is decorated, the reception hall is ready, and Holly isn’t wearing any panties.It’s a day filled with love, laughter, and a lot of sex.Join these two one last time for spicy, romantic fun as we say goodbye, and they say hello to the rest of their lives.
author: Dana Isaly
